column5: What kind of minnows do the local bait shops sell? I was thinking of bringing some salted minnows along and thought I would bring what they sell up there. Thanks Otts

When we crossed into Canada last week the border guard asked us if we had any salted minnows. We did not. After we continued we were wondering if salted minnows were not allowed. We did not ask if they were not allowed. Dont know for sure.
The minnows that F.R.C. sells are Dace minnows. People I know that take salted minnows just buy whats available at home. It doesn't seem to make much difference. Good Luck with what ever you use. JT
